   <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
    function tmb_search() 
         {
             document.forms[0].action = "http://tmb.tomas.travel/irs/TPortalTMB/start.jsp?";
             //document.forms[0].method = "POST";
             document.forms[0].target = "_blank";
             var viewstate = document.getElementById("__VIEWSTATE").value;
             document.getElementById("__VIEWSTATE").value ="";
             document.forms[0].submit();
             document.getElementById("__VIEWSTATE").value = viewstate;
         }
         function fill_date() 
         {
             var heute = new Date();
             var jahr = heute.getFullYear();
             var monat = heute.getMonth() + 1; monat = (monat < 10) ? "0" + monat : monat;
             var tag = heute.getDate(); tag = (tag < 10) ? "0" + tag : tag;
             if (document.getElementById("anreise").value == "") document.getElementById("anreise").value = tag + "." + monat + "." + jahr;
             if (document.getElementById("abreise").value == "") document.getElementById("abreise").value = tag + "." + monat + "." + jahr;
         }
   </script>

  <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
   function updateMinHeight() {
         var myWidth = 0, myHeight = 0;
 
         if (typeof (window.innerWidth) == 'number') {
             //Non-IE
             myWidth = window.innerWidth;
             myHeight = window.innerHeight;
         }
         else if (document.documentElement && (document.documentElement.clientWidth || document.documentElement.clientHeight)) {
             //IE 6+ in 'standards compliant mode'
             myWidth = document.documentElement.clientWidth;
             myHeight = document.documentElement.clientHeight;
         }
         else if (document.body && (document.body.clientWidth || document.body.clientHeight)) {
             //IE 4 compatible
             myWidth = document.body.clientWidth;
             myHeight = document.body.clientHeight;
         }
         return myHeight;
     }
     updateMinHeight();
     //var theTimer = setTimeout("loop()", 100);
     //if (navigator.appName == "Microsoft Internet Explorer") 
     //    document.getElementById("bottom_placeholder").style.height = 20 + "px";
 
     
 
     function loop() {
         var myHeight = updateMinHeight();
         //if (navigator.appName == "Netscape")
         document.getElementById("layout_Page").style.minHeight = myHeight + "px";
         theTimer = setTimeout("loop()", 100);
 
     }
  </script>
